content: this beanie was made for my godchild holly it fits a young teen but can be adjusted to fit a child or adult by adjusting the hook size this is a great opportunity to use yarn from your stash you can use as many or as few colours as you wish it uses us terminology skill level - easy peasy **materials you will need** ➢ any dk 8ply yarn of your choice ➢ 4mm hook ➢ needle for sewing in ends you are more than welcome to work the beanie in any yarn of your choice however depending on the yarn and gauge you may have a size difference the pattern does not have detailed photo tutorials visit our facebook group for pattern support and other info https //www facebook com/groups/1370975902929963/
